hints.content: To subtract on the number line, we start at $93$ and move **left** $\purpleD{50}$ and then $\maroonD{4}$ more.

This number line shows $93 - 54$:

![A number line has points labeled question mark, 43, and 93. From 93 an arrow goes to 43 with the label minus 50 above the arrow. Another arrow goes from 43 to question mark with the label minus 4 above the arrow.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/842f768a7275e0bbf097d72da72adc2ad5df49cb)

choices.content: ![A number line has points labeled question mark, 43, and 93. From 93 an arrow goes to 43 with the label minus 50 above the arrow. ![A number line has points labeled question mark, 53, and 93. From 93 an arrow goes to 53 with the label minus 40 above the arrow. Another arrow goes from 53 to question mark with the label minus 5 above the arrow.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/26d814090cb6f418280968b6e2b551316ebf4d4f)

![A number line has points labeled question mark, 88, and 93. From 93 an arrow goes to 88 with the label minus 5 above the arrow. Another arrow goes from 88 to question mark with the label minus 4 above the arrow.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/b40bf3fdf1957811b54174b8519efc0fe033bdff)
